weather_report:
Morning in Subiaco opens under a clean blue dome, the sun already bright and assertive, shadows crisp along the verandas. Expect the day to stay mostly sunny through late morning, with a soft quilt of scattered clouds wandering in after lunch that won’t do much to blunt the light. UV will climb quickly and stay fierce through midday, so this is a hat-and-sunscreen sort of day; sunglasses and a light, breathable layer will feel right as the air warms.

It looks like a pleasant, clear day for simple things done at an easy pace: a stroll to pick up bread and greens, hanging the washing so it dries in no time, a book and a long glass of water at a shaded café table, or a short ride to the library while the streets are still quiet. Open the windows, let the clean brightness through, and keep to the shade when the sun turns insistent.
